resources.string: Please select one of the following language.

- This scheme is applicable from 16th April 2019 to 15th Aug 2019 for Pan India 
- This scheme is applicable on purchase made by the dealer from authorized distributor 
- Eligible dealer can claim their gift from respective authorized distributor (Please note company is not responsible for scheme disbursement) 
- Company reserve the right to amend/withdraw/discontinue/alter/the scheme without prior notice 
- In case of non-availability of specified gifts, company reserve all the rights to interchange the gift with another gift of equivalent value 
- Scheme is not extended to HKVA UPS and Eco Watt 350 
- In case of any dispute, dealer need to settle it with respective distributors (company is not responsible for dispute settlement of dealers) 
- Gold coupons can only be redeemed after the redemption of 7 normal Magical 7 cards. 
- The Coupons are non-transferable

- This scheme is applicable from 1st April to 31st July for Pan India 
- Distributor can activate their coupons from their M-partner 
- Company reserve the right to amend/withdraw/discontinue/alter/the scheme without prior notice 
- In case of non-availability of specified gifts, company reserve all the rights to interchange the gift with another gift of equivalent value 
- Scheme is not extended to HKVA UPS and Eco Watt 350 
- In case of any dispute, dealer need to settle it with respective distributors (company is not responsible for dispute settlement of dealers) 
- The coupons are not transferrable. 
- The company reserves the right to amend/withdraw/discontinue/alter the scheme with any prior notice. 
- Distributor can Activate coupons from 16th April 2019 to 15th Aug 2019 
- 3 HUPS= 1 Battery and vice-versa will be consider for no of sets calculation 
- Distributor can only claim reimbursement for Magical 7 cards as per his primary purchase in the scheme period. (1st April 2019 to 31st July 2019)

1. Luminous Connect + program is for dealers and valid from 1st April 2019 to 30th September 2019. 
 2. Luminous Power Technologies Private Limited reserves the absolute right to withdraw/amend/discontinue/alter this program at any point of time. 
 3. In case of any dispute the decision of the company shall be final and binding. All disputes are subject to Delhi jurisdiction only. 
 4. Battery, HUPS and Stabilizers must be sold and entered within 9 and 15 months respectively from the date of manufacturing 
 5. Panels and Stabilizers must be billed to Luminous after 30th September and 31st December, 2017 respectively. 
 6. Company reserves all the rights to interchange the trip with any other trip of equivalent value. 
 7. If eligible for foreign trip, the dealer and distributor has to arrange passport by their own Company is not responsible for the same. If partner cannot provide the passport then He/She is not eligible for the trip. 
 8. All entries of customer is done through M-partner only 
 9. All fields are mandatory, customer name, 10 digits Mobile number, address and sale date. 
 10. All entries pertaining to this scheme must be done before 30th September 2019, 11:30 PM. 
 11. Cross checking of customer details will be done on sample basis and found faulty then serial number with wrong details will not be considered for the scheme. 
 12. Dealer cannot claim multiple gifts of lower slab based on point achieved. Disbursement will be done based on point utilization on descending order. 
 13. Double negative marking will be done for all entries found with inaccurate customer details.
